entry.title: Brazil's Leftist Former President Wins First Round of Election
entry.content: The result means current President Jair Bolsonaro and Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva, who served two terms but was jailed on a corruption charge, will face each other in an Oct. 30 runoff.

entry.title: Ukraine Pushes South Into Strategic Kherson Region
entry.content: Ukrainian forces broke through Russian lines and made new advances in the southern region, even as they continued developing their rapid offensive in the eastern part of the country.
